import React, { Component } from 'react' import WrapComponents from '@/components/wrapper' import { ColoredButtons, TransparentButtons } from '@/components/button' import { SmallHeading } from '@/components/headings' import { Checkbox } from '@/components/checkBox' import Stepper from '@/components/stepper' import AdvanceFeature from './advanceFeature' import './index.scss' import androidMobile from '../../../../assets/images/andriod.png' class StepTwo extends Component { state = { steps: ['Channel', 'Message', 'Segmentation', 'Scheduling', 'Overview'], title: '', message: '', advance: false, } saveAndContinue = e => { e.preventDefault() this.props.data.push(this.state) this.props.nextStep() } back = e => { e.preventDefault() this.props.prevStep() } toggleState(advance) { this.setState({ advance }) } handleInputFields(key, value) { if (!value) { this.setState({ [key]: value, }) } else { this.setState({ [key]: value, }) } } render() { const { steps, title, message, advance } = this.state return (
Title this.props.handleInputFields('title', e.target.value) } /> Message this.props.handleInputFields('message', e.target.value) } /> { this.toggleState(!advance) }} > Advance
{advance && } Continue Save as Draft

) } } export default StepTwo
